code: @Override public void onApplicationEvent(ApplicationEnvironmentPreparedEvent event) {     ConfigurableEnvironment environment = event.getEnvironment().     String url = cleanRemoteUrl(environment.getProperty(NON_OPTION_ARGS)).     Assert.state(StringUtils.hasLength(url), "No remote URL specified").     Assert.state(url.indexOf(',') == -1, "Multiple URLs specified").     try {         new URI(url).     } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {         throw new IllegalStateException("Malformed URL '" + url + "'").     }     Map<String, Object> source = Collections.singletonMap("remoteUrl", (Object) url).     PropertySource<?> propertySource = new MapPropertySource("remoteUrl", source).     environment.getPropertySources().addLast(propertySource). }
private String cleanRemoteUrl(String url) {     if (StringUtils.hasText(url) && url.endsWith("/")) {         return url.substring(0, url.length() - 1).     }     return url. }
